mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_id, commenter_id, comment_content, comment_time, comment_note) VALUES(#{post_id}, #{commenter_id}, #{comment_content}, #{comment_time}, #{comment_note})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.commenter_id, c.comment_content, u.username, DATE_FORMAT(c.comment_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') comment_time FROM comment c INNER JOIN user u ON c.commenter_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{post_id} ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC
